name: Turn The Lights Off
description:
A clone of the Tiger Electronics classic "Lights Out". Toggle the lights using the buttons and try to turn them all off! Random puzzles mean endless fun*!

* Fun is only endless if you actually enjoy these puzzles; additionally, there are a finite number of possible puzzles**.

** Of course, that number is over 53 unvigintillion (53 undecillion, if you're from a country that uses the long-scale method of naming powers of ten), so for all intents and purposes, it's endless.
